remarks: Functions defined by well-founded recursion are identical up to relation, domain, and characteristic function.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2011.)
statement:
wfr3g $p |- ( ( ( R We A /\ R Se A ) /\ ( F Fn A /\ A. y e. A ( F ` y ) = ( H ` ( F |` Pred ( R , A , y ) ) ) ) /\ ( G Fn A /\ A. y e. A ( G ` y ) = ( H ` ( G |` Pred ( R , A , y ) ) ) ) ) -> F = G ) $.
$d A y $.
$d F y $.
$d G y $.
$d H y $.
$d R y $.
